slots.name: strain
slots.description: Specific cannabis strain or cultivar mentioned by the user (e.g., Blue Dream, OG Kush, Gelato)
prompts: Which strain are you interested in?

slots.name: quantity
slots.description: Amount or volume of cannabis product requested or discussed (e.g., 1 gram, 3.5 grams, 1/8 oz)

slots.name: product_type
slots.description: Category or form of cannabis product (e.g., flower, edible, vape, tincture, concentrate)
prompts: What type of product are you looking for?

slots.name: effect
slots.description: Desired or experienced effects from cannabis consumption (e.g., relaxed, euphoric, focused, sleepy, energetic)
prompts: What effects are you looking for?
Describe the kind of experience you want.

slots.name: flavor
slots.description: Flavor or aroma profile preferences or descriptions (e.g., citrus, earthy, pine, berry, diesel)
prompts: Do you like any particular aroma?

slots.name: brand
slots.description: Cannabis brand or manufacturer referenced (e.g., Kiva, Stiiizy, Raw Garden)
prompts: Is there a brand you're interested in?

slots.name: condition
slots.description: Medical or wellness condition user wants to address (e.g., anxiety, insomnia, chronic pain, stress)
prompts: What condition are you seeking relief from?
Are you using cannabis for any specific health issue?

slots.name: dosage
slots.description: Recommended or requested amount of active compounds (e.g., 10mg THC, 1:1 CBD:THC ratio)
prompts: Specify the THC/CBD amount or ratio.

slots.name: delivery_method
slots.description: Method of consumption or delivery (e.g., smoking, vaping, ingestion, sublingual, topical)
prompts: How do you plan to consume?
What delivery method do you prefer?

slots.name: location
slots.description: User's geographic location, city, state, or zip code for service availability and compliance
prompts: Please provide your city or zip code.

slots.name: time_of_use
slots.description: Preferred or actual time of cannabis use (e.g., morning, afternoon, evening, nighttime)
prompts: When do you plan to use it?
What time of day will you be consuming?

slots.name: grow_method
slots.description: Cultivation technique used (e.g., indoor, outdoor, hydroponic, organic)
prompts: What grow method are you interested in?

slots.name: terpene
slots.description: Specific terpene profiles mentioned or desired (e.g., myrcene, limonene, caryophyllene)
prompts: Are there any terpenes you prefer?
Which terpene profile do you want?

slots.name: tolerance_level
slots.description: User's cannabis tolerance or experience level (e.g., beginner, intermediate, high tolerance)
prompts: How experienced are you with cannabis?

slots.name: price_range
slots.description: Desired price range for cannabis products
prompts: What price range are you looking for?

slots.name: thc_content
slots.description: Amount or percentage of THC in product (e.g., 20%, 15mg)
prompts: What THC content do you prefer?

slots.name: cbd_content
slots.description: Amount or percentage of CBD in product (e.g., 5%, 50mg)
prompts: What CBD content do you prefer?

slots.name: age
slots.description: User's age for legal compliance and appropriate recommendations

slots.name: language
slots.description: Preferred language for communication and interface

slots.name: avatar_style
slots.description: Preferred avatar or AI assistant persona style
prompts: What avatar personality do you prefer?

slots.name: payment_method
slots.description: Preferred payment type or method
prompts: What payment method will you use?

slots.name: delivery_time
slots.description: Preferred or requested delivery time or window

slots.name: usage_purpose
slots.description: User's intent or reason for cannabis use
prompts: What is your purpose for using cannabis?

slots.name: interaction_mode
slots.description: Preferred interaction method with the platform or AI
prompts: How do you want to interact?

slots.name: product_name
slots.description: Specific product name referenced by the user
prompts: Which product are you referring to?

slots.name: store
slots.description: Dispensary or retail location mentioned
prompts: Which store are you interested in?

slots.name: subscription_plan
slots.description: Subscription or membership tier
prompts: Which subscription plan do you want?

slots.name: promo_code
slots.description: Promotional or discount code used or requested
prompts: Do you have a discount code?

slots.name: packaging_type
slots.description: Preferred packaging style or feature

slots.name: review_sentiment
slots.description: Tone or sentiment of user reviews or feedback
prompts: How would you rate this product?

slots.name: cultivation_stage
slots.description: Stage of cannabis cultivation referenced
prompts: What growth stage are you asking about?

slots.name: grow_light_type
slots.description: Type of grow lighting mentioned or preferred
prompts: Which grow light type do you use?

slots.name: soil_type
slots.description: Type of growing medium used or preferred
prompts: What soil type do you prefer?

slots.name: nutrient_brand
slots.description: Brand of nutrients or fertilizers used
prompts: Which nutrient brand do you use?

slots.name: experience_level
slots.description: User’s cannabis knowledge or growing experience
prompts: How familiar are you with cannabis?

slots.name: session_duration
slots.description: Expected or planned duration of cannabis use session
prompts: How long will your session last?

slots.name: delivery_service
slots.description: Name of cannabis delivery service or platform
prompts: Which delivery service do you prefer?

slots.name: discount_type
slots.description: Type of discount or promotion applied
prompts: What kind of discount do you have?

slots.name: cannabinoid_profile
slots.description: Specific cannabinoid makeup or focus
prompts: What cannabinoid profile do you want?

slots.name: ritual_context
slots.description: Cultural, spiritual, or social context for use
prompts: In what context will you use it?

slots.name: session_setting
slots.description: Physical or social setting of cannabis use

slots.name: hardware_type
slots.description: Device or accessory used for consumption

slots.name: avatar_voice
slots.description: Preferred voice style or tone of the AI assistant

slots.name: legal_status
slots.description: Legal status of cannabis use or possession for user
prompts: Are you legally allowed to use cannabis?

slots.name: consumption_frequency
slots.description: How often the user consumes cannabis

slots.name: microdosing_preference
slots.description: Whether user prefers low-dose or microdosing approach
prompts: Are you interested in low doses?

slots.name: strain_lineage
slots.description: Genetic heritage or parent strains of a cannabis strain
examples: OG Kush x Girl Scout Cookies

slots.name: seasonal_preference
slots.description: Preferred seasonal use or strain association
prompts: Do you have a seasonal preference?
What season do you prefer for use?

slots.name: community_role
slots.description: User's role in cannabis communities or social spaces
prompts: How do you participate in cannabis culture?

slots.name: environment_concern
slots.description: User preference for sustainable or eco-friendly cannabis options
prompts: Do you prefer environmentally friendly products?
